Title: Bionicle: The Legend Reborn

Actors: Dee Bradley Baker, Jeff Bennett, Jim Cummings, Michael Dorn
Plot: Once the ruler of an entire universe, the Great Spirit Mata Nui finds himself cast out of his own body, his spirit trapped inside the fabled Mask of Life, hurtling through space. After ...
